column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=As you campaign around your riding , it 's likely that some issues are mentioned more often by voters , than other issues .
#Text=What would you say are the three hottest topics this election , in your riding ?
#Text=What would you and your party do to address these issues ?
#Text=Health Care :
#Text=We have too few doctors .
#Text=Our hospitals are over-crowded .
#Text=Emergency rooms and clinics require long waits .
#Text=New Democrats will invest in our health care system .
#Text=By creating training spaces for doctors and nurses , all of us will have access to proper care , and wait times for treatment will be shortened .
#Text=By building long term care facilities , hospital overcrowding will be relieved , and we will be able to treat our growing number of seniors with dignity .
#Text=Environment :

#Text=The New Democrats are not proposing a carbon tax because it will not motivate the person who can afford a Cadillac SUV to use less fuel , but it will impact the ordinary family trying to keep their own car on the road .
#Text=The NDP transportation strategy will invest in Canadian production of " green " cars .
#Text=We will provide incentives to those who purchase more efficient vehicles .
#Text=We will bring in mandatory vehicle emissions standards .
#Text=And we will increase support for rail and other transport so that dependence on cars can be reduced .
#Text=The New Democrats will help large companies audit their energy use , and offer incentives to help them reduce consumption .
#Text=Allowable emissions by industries will be firmly capped , and this cap will be lowered year by year .
#Text=Subsidies and tax breaks currently handed out to the petroleum industry will be stopped .
#Text=Owners of homes and commercial buildings will be encouraged to improve their efficiency by grants and tax incentives .
#Text=The building code will be amended to insure lower energy use ( as well as fuel bills ) .
#Text=The NDP will re-instate the EnerGuide for Houses Retrofit Incentive Program , one of the many programs cut by Harper 's Conservatives .

#Text=New Democrats will see that an east-west energy grid is built to reliably connect the clean hydro power from Manitoba , Quebec , Newfoundland and Labrador with the areas currently burning coal .
#Text=We will target 10 000 megawatts of wind generation capacity by 2010 , and place a priority on manufacturing wind turbines and solar panels in Canada .
#Text=There is a big opportunity here for our manufacturing sector , and the good jobs that would result .
#Text=The Economy :
#Text=Fuel prices are hurting people .
#Text=Good jobs are leaving the country .
#Text=We need to have alternatives to gasoline and fuel oil .
#Text=The price is only going to increase .
#Text=Stephen Harper and the Calgary Petroleum Club will do nothing about it , since that 's how oil companies make their fat profits .
#Text=The New Democrats will stop the tax breaks and subsidies given away to Big Oil and other large corporations .
#Text=We will use that money to invest in a " green " economy .
#Text=We should be making our own no-gas cars , wind turbines , solar arrays , energy storage , electric railways ...
#Text=There is plenty of room here for us be world-leaders in the new way of doing things .
#Text=There are profits to be made , and plenty of good jobs .
